message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,500,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am only able to offer $1,400,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,400,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,475,000. I think this price reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am unable to go above $1,450,000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
